net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.field

Interface UiWidgetLocalDateField

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractValidatableObject, Accessibility, AttributeReadAccessKey, AttributeReadAriaRole, AttributeReadDisposed, AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadFocused, AttributeReadHtmlId, AttributeReadId<String>, AttributeReadLabel, AttributeReadMaximumTextLength, AttributeReadMode, AttributeReadModeFixed, AttributeReadModified, AttributeReadPrimaryStyle, AttributeReadStyles, AttributeReadStylesAdvanced, AttributeReadTooltip, AttributeReadTrimValue, AttributeReadValidationFailure, AttributeReadValue<LocalDate>, AttributeReadValueAdvanced<LocalDate>, AttributeReadValueAsString, AttributeReadVisible, AttributeReadVisibleRecursive, AttributeWriteAccessKey, AttributeWriteDisposed, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteFocused, AttributeWriteHtmlId, AttributeWriteId<String>, AttributeWriteLabel, AttributeWriteMaximumTextLength, AttributeWriteMode, AttributeWriteModeFixed, AttributeWriteOnlyFocused, AttributeWritePrimaryStyle, AttributeWriteStyles, AttributeWriteStylesAdvanced, AttributeWriteTooltip, AttributeWriteTrimValue, AttributeWriteValidationFailure, AttributeWriteValue<LocalDate>, AttributeWriteValueAdvanced<LocalDate>, AttributeWriteValueAsString, AttributeWriteVisible, AttributeWriteVisibleAdvanced, HasValueValidators<LocalDate>, UiFeature, UiFeatureEvent, UiFeatureFocus, UiFeatureMessages, UiFeatureMode, UiFeatureValidation<LocalDate>, UiFeatureValue<LocalDate>, UiFeatureValueAndValidation<LocalDate>, UiWidget, UiWidgetAbstractComposite, UiWidgetAbstractWithValue<LocalDate>, UiWidgetActive, UiWidgetComposite<UiWidget>, UiWidgetField<LocalDate>, UiWidgetNative, UiWidgetRegular, UiWidgetRegularComposite<UiWidget>, UiWidgetTextualInputField<LocalDate>, UiWidgetWithValue<LocalDate>, ValidatableObject<LocalDate>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetLocalDateField, UiWidgetLocalDateFieldGwt, UiWidgetLocalDateFieldTestImpl

    public interface UiWidgetLocalDateField
extends UiWidgetTextualInputField<LocalDate>, UiWidgetNative
    This is the interface for a textual input field that allows to display and enter a value of the type LocalDate with day, month and year but without any time-related information. It should both support a textual input field as well as a (icon-)button that opens a calendar popup to pick the date from. If this widget is not available by the underlying native toolkit, an implementation shall be provided that is based on UiWidgetTextField.
    Here you can see an example (with field label "Date of birth"): 
     Date of birth:
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
